Author: mango_dietcoke
Text: I have used RR before when I did my first recovery. Only my therapist was on the other side. Personally, I do think it is wayyyy to much to have family and even a spouse on there.. but you have to design your recovery for you and be honest with yourself and fam about boundaries (if you want them).  Good luck!! ğŸ’•ğŸ€
